meanings.definition: Pronounced with a different emphasis or stress.
meanings.sent1: The reaccented word stood out in the sentence.
meanings.sent2: Her reaccented pronunciation made the word sound unique.
meanings.sent3: The reaccented syllable danced around the sentence playfully.
meanings.sent4: His reaccented tone painted a vivid picture of the story.
meanings.sent5: The reaccented stress added a new dimension to the sentence.

meanings.definition: To emphasize or stress a particular syllable or word in speech.
meanings.sent1: She reaccented the word to highlight its importance.
meanings.sent2: When teaching pronunciation, it's important to reaccent words clearly.
meanings.sent3: He reaccented the syllable dramatically, causing laughter in the room.
meanings.sent4: The singer reaccented the note, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: To make the point clear, reaccent the key word in your sentence.
